member.name: D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE
member.summary: Specifies the paint type for an SVG fill or stroke.

member.name: D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE.D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE_NONE
member.summary: The fill or stroke is not rendered.

member.name: D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE.D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE_URI
member.summary: A paint server, defined by another element in the SVG document, is used.

member.name: D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE.D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE_URI_NONE
member.summary: A paint server, defined by another element in the SVG document, is used. If the paint server reference is invalid, fall back to D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE_NONE.

member.name: D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE.D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE_URI_COLOR
member.summary: A paint server, defined by another element in the SVG document, is used. If the paint server reference is invalid, fall back to D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE_COLOR.

member.name: D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE.D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE_URI_CURRENT_COLOR
member.summary: A paint server, defined by another element in the SVG document, is used. If the paint server reference is invalid, fall back to D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE_CURRENT_COLOR.
